cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Upgrading from Kentico Xperience 13 to Xperience by Kentico might feel like a big step, but with the right approach, it is easier than it seems. Our new "Walk through the upgrade step-by-step" guide shows that you can get your site up and running quickly and efficiently—without a full redesign or major front-end development expenses.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Upgrading from KX13 to Xperience by Kentico: New Step-by-Step Guide

Our new ["Walk through the upgrade step-by-step"](https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/migrate-from-kx13/upgrade-walkthrough "https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/migrate-from-kx13/upgrade-walkthrough") guide shows that you can get your site up and running quickly and efficiently—without a full redesign or major front-end development expenses.

### What You’ll Gain from This Guide?

* **Demystify the process**: We use the **Dancing Goat** sample site to break the upgrade down into clear, manageable steps.
* **Understand key considerations**: Get a feel for the architectural differences between KX13 and Xperience by Kentico.
* **Get practical tips**: The walkthrough addresses common challenges and gotchas to ensure a successful upgrade.

While real-world projects might involve additional complexities—such as custom integrations or content model adjustments—this guide shows that the core upgrade process is **structured, straightforward, and well-supported**.

Whether you’re a **software architect, developer, tech lead, or another technical role**, if you prefer learning by doing, this **[step-by-step upgrade guide](https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/migrate-from-kx13/upgrade-walkthrough "https://docs.kentico.com/guides/architecture/migrate-from-kx13/upgrade-walkthrough")** is for you!
